input.sentences: the canadians stood proud in the american streets !
they went on strike and decided that unless they got more money | they would n't distribute maple syrup .
this caused a huge commotion within congress . they had to make a decision .
they decided to give more money to canadians in exchange for their maple syrup .
output.sentences: The Canadian flag waved over the streets above the offices of the maple syrup company.
Their workers were striking due to the low wages they were receiving.
To bring the strike to an end, congress got involved.
The decision of congress was to increase the minimum wage of workers in the maple syrup industry.
The workers were very happy with their victory.
